name: Suspicious Lakkaberry Krumkakes
desc: A classic dessert from Nod-Krai. The edges are soft from moisture, with a texture more like egg crepes than krumkakes. Fortunately, the center is still crispy. If scoffed down quickly, you should be able to avoid any unpleasantness...

customize.name: Recipe: Lakkaberry Krumkakes
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Lakkaberry Krumkakes.

customize.name: Lakkaberry Krumkakes
customize.desc: A classic dessert from Nod-Krai. The batter is put on a griddle and swiftly rolled up, while butter is added and fruits are sprinkled on top. Crispy, crunchy, and sweetly aromatic, it is very popular among children.

customize.name: Delicious Lakkaberry Krumkakes
customize.desc: A classic dessert from Nod-Krai. The crispy egg rolls break apart in the mouth with a heavenly crackle, contrasting with the smooth, sweet filling inside. A juxtaposition of textures that come together in perfect harmony on the palate. Before the taste has had time to linger, the hand has already reached for another bite.

customize.name: Suspicious Lakkaberry Krumkakes
customize.desc: A classic dessert from Nod-Krai. The edges are soft from moisture, with a texture more like egg crepes than krumkakes. Fortunately, the center is still crispy. If scoffed down quickly, you should be able to avoid any unpleasantness...

customize.name: Lakkaberry
customize.desc:
A fruit as white as pearl that tastes refreshingly sweet.
In the legends of the Frostmoon Scions, these fruits, like kuuhenki, are a gift from the Moon Maiden, a sacred symbol blessed by the new moon. Therefore, sharing and eating delicious Lakkaberries is also a form of worshipping Kuutar.
Even when not associated with the divine, their plumpness and sweetness alone are enough to awaken one's appetite.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Bird Egg
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Smetana
customize.desc: A dairy product produced through complex processes such as separation and fermentation. It has a smooth texture and a refreshing sourness, often serving as the finishing touch in many dishes.

value.text: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 20% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
